articles.title: ICICI Bank board nods fundraising of ₹25,000 cr via debt securities
articles.description: ICICI Bank directors approved fundraising by way of issuances of debt securities including by way of non-convertible debentures in domestic markets up to an overall limit of  ₹25,000 crore by way of the private placement.
articles.content: ICICI Bank on Saturday received the board of directors' approval for fundraising to the tune of 25,000 crore in the current financial year FY23 through the issuance of debt securities.
